html:
1.25.21  12:58 pm   what's your opinion on rhyming?

      laissez faire

1.25.21  12:55 pm   how was your VACATION IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SUN?

      relaxing but too hot

1.25.21  12:46 pm   just wanted to let you know that the songs page says here comes the sun came out in 2020 instead of 2021

      yes that's when the audio recording was completed

1.25.21  12:10 pm   was might quit hinting at you might quitting

      no

1.25.21  11:52 am   Now you have the new graphics department up and running do you think you will be making more reality videos anytime soon? 

      yes

1.25.21  11:29 am   when is "adventures of the helium balloon" coming out?

      january 30, 2018

1.25.21  10:54 am   did you just take a big long nap through 2020

      no

1.25.21  10:02 am   Is it worth distinguishing between add2/add4 and add9/add11 for chord symbols?

      2 and 4 might be easier to read

1.25.21  9:43 am   do you think the meaning of an art piece is implied by the creator or the viewers that see it?

      gonna have to be a collaboration

1.25.21  9:41 am   what is your selection process for songs?

      first, generate some entirely new ones. then when i'm done doing that, then, go through the entire list of everything and find ones that i would be excited about doing, and put those in a 'finalists' list. like the play-offs, in sports. top 20 or 30. Then, i actually start working on the writing for some of those, without choosing yet. Then i set a hard deadline, sometime in the next 24 hours, to decide which will be the next one to be finished, recorded, vidified etc. It gets pretty painful toward the end, and sometimes there is a lot of feelings of remorse and dread the next day. but in the end i have to trust the system because it's the best system i have

1.25.21  9:23 am   why does europe exist?

      you requested it

1.25.21  9:19 am   Are you a stickler for grammar or are you willing to take heavy artistic liberties ?

      think of it this way, i'm a stickler for artistic liberties

1.25.21  9:17 am   which was your favourite video to edit? or do you not have one

      i would prefer to edit a new one to be my favorite

1.25.21  8:41 am   Did you ever have to justify to someone why you wanted to be a musician?

      only on this page

1.25.21  8:17 am   Are you working on a video which will be posted on Youtube?

      yes

1.25.21  7:53 am   what's that cool sound in the background at 2:02 in La de Da de Da de Day Oh and also at 0:40 in Outside?

      i don't hear any of the same sounds in those 2 places

1.25.21  7:19 am   Do you delete the default cube

      was never there

1.25.21  6:10 am   Opinions on remote learning?

      EXTREMELY ONLINE

1.25.21  5:55 am   What are your opinions on cashews

      sometimes you gotta do a little math to find out how much of the cashew you actually halve

1.25.21  5:50 am   do you already know if your next video is going to be a song or a non song?(like wfaoie)

      yes

1.25.21  5:33 am   The best part of 2021 so far is your song. But are there more coming in the incoming months?

      yes

1.25.21  5:29 am   what do the knobs on your keyboard do?

      change midi values

1.25.21  2:11 am   At around 1:13 of Might Quit, you reference a food called "Ice butter" in your visuals. Would you consider this to be a healthy snack?

     no

     If not, does this have any significance besides being Ice Butter?

     i think the lesson here is, the power words can have, in justifying an extremely low budget graphics decision, in a time crunch

1.25.21  2:03 am   do you have any plans/intentions to release any of your songs in an album format?

      no

1.25.21  1:31 am   how important was buying a binder to your transformation into actually releasing music

      i bought way more than 1 binder. it was a good boost of confidence to put all the song books on the shelf

1.25.21  1:24 am   do you generally prefer the process of recording songs or creating videos?

      not sure

1.25.21  1:24 am   how long does making a video take to create

      it should be pretty quick

1.25.21  12:59 am   What is your favorite song that you wrote?

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

1.25.21  12:19 am   Was "might quit" hinting at the 3d modeling?

      almost every video after 'history of the entire world' has hinted at 3D modeling

1.25.21  12:06 am   have you ever thought to explore the creative possibilities in not being creative?

      yes

1.25.21  12:04 am   have you acquired infinite patience yet through answering questions

      no

1.24.21  11:35 pm   what happened to you during 2020?

     i was learning how to make videos

     and why did you "quit" or take a long break was it for content of might quit?

     hey come on, that one took like 5 weeks which i know is long compared to what i wanted, but that's still pretty quick compared to some of the other ones

1.24.21  11:13 pm   How do you make lyrics. 

      musically

1.24.21  10:55 pm   do you ever use capitals

      yes

1.24.21  10:53 pm   Who is an inspiration for you?

      could be you

1.24.21  10:34 pm   How do you free yourself from a situation you don't want to be in but getting out of it could turn your world upside down? Sorry for vague-ness Bill.

      start by calculating how upside down your world currently is. then you'll know how much to turn it

1.24.21  9:34 pm   why did you choose to release here comes the sun on the day you did?

      because i finished it

1.24.21  9:01 pm   What inspired u to make songs?

      songs are a superpower

1.24.21  8:48 pm   So Wait You Worked On "Here Comes The Sun" FOR A WHOLE YEAR,

     no

      I'm Confused -_-

     me too

1.24.21  8:45 pm   when you listen to music other people made do you tend to focus more on the lyrics or the music?

     no

     for example, are you fine to listen to music in another language with no concept of what the lyrics are speaking about

     if music is involved, that communicates a high percentage of the concept. regardless of which spoken language it's using

1.24.21  8:20 pm   hey bill, i need to give a speech and i want to put a quote in it. any suggestions

      yes, make sure your speech is not the first speech. unless you enjoy quoting yourself

1.24.21  6:56 pm   What is the sun symbolizing in "here comes the sun"

      pretty good news

1.24.21  6:20 pm   In 'here comes the sun' you say you're just falling in love.

     you took that out of context

     Is there anyone/thing in particular or is it just things in general?

      the previous line was about falling in love. so at that point i'm just joining in on the fun

1.24.21  6:11 pm   Is it a coincidence that your last video before you went away for 6 months its about quitting?

      yes

1.24.21  6:09 pm   did you ever expect to return after "
Might quit" 

      not necessary. i didn't leave

1.24.21  6:00 pm   Best way to start off with making a song?

      it comes to you in a dream, you loved it in the dream, and then you are able to write it all down when you wake up

1.24.21  5:41 pm   Did you expect "here comes the sun" to take so long that you made "I might quit"?

      no, i would have expected here comes the sun to take an ordinary amount of time, but, i didn't know that that was going to be the next song at the time

1.24.21  5:26 pm   do you think there's a connection between music taste and personality?

     sure

     If there is , then what do you think that says about your fans?

     i guess that depends whether they like my music

1.24.21  4:28 pm   So before you said your upcoming project would be your favorite

     i never said that

     and now that it's out is it your favorite?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.24.21  3:37 pm   How do you learn an artform so well but not compromise any uniqueness?

     basically it just takes a lot of time. take the amount of time it takes to learn something well, then the amount time to have uniqueness (?? i don't know how much time that's supposed to be) and just add those 2 together. do both

     Do you think you'll make music until you die?

     i'll try
